Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Esho nishio eshitabu shibulamwo obukanakani nishiobulunjifu khubalia abaria Nyasaye
Balia abasuubilanga mubilalolekha, abaswaliyanga (iswala) khatsotso, ne barusinjia eshihanwa khumukabo kwa khubakabile
Balia basuubilanga khu kalia keshibwa khwiwe, nende kalia keshibwa imbeli wuwo, ne basuubilanga muno inyanga yeyindukho
Abo bali khubulunjifu okhurula khu Nyasaye wabu, ne abo nibobalibura
